shape_area

Class TwoDimensionalArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape_area.TwoDimensionalArea

  • public class TwoDimensionalArea
extends java.lang.Object
    The class contains various methods to calculate area of different shapes such as triangle,square, rectangle,circle,parallelogram and rhombus.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TwoDimensionalArea() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double calcArea_Circle(double radius)
      Calculates the area of circle when its radius is passed to the method.
      static double calcArea_Parallelogram(double altitude, double side)
      Calculates the area of parallelogram when its side and altitude are passed to the method.
      static double calcArea_Rectangle(double length, double width)
      Calculates the area of rectangle when its length and width are passed to the method.
      static double calcArea_Rhombus(double side, double altitude)
      Calculates the area of rhombus when its side and altitude are passed to the method.
      static double calcArea_Square(double side)
      Calculates the area of square when its side is passed to the method.
      static double calcArea_SquareDiagonal(double diagonal)
      Calculates the area of square when its diagonal is passed to the method.
      static double calcArea_Triangle(double base, double height)
      Calculates the area of triangle when the base and height are passed to the method.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        public static double calcArea_Triangle(double base,
                                       double height)
        Calculates the area of triangle when the base and height are passed to the method.
        Parameters:
        base - accepts the base value of triangle from user.
        height - accepts the height value of triangle from user
        Returns:
        this method returns the area of triangle.
